document.full_text: the head of bahrain's military claimed that the country's brutal crackdown on dissent was entirely justified because the kingdom's security forces had been confronted by young protesters under the influence of mind-altering drugs.
document.title: the lede: bahrain's protesters were drugged, official claims
lines_and_colors: the head of bahrain's military claimed that the country's brutal crackdown on dissent was entirely justified because the kingdom's security forces had been confronted by young protesters under the influence of mind-altering drugs.
